title: Geminid watch + pop-up sky mini-salon
location: Tallinn dark-pocket options: Paljassaare, Pirita beach, Harku forest edge
vibe: Citizen science / cozy astro nerd session
reason: No formal astronomy nights listed, but the Geminids are the year’s best shower and Tallinn’s long nights help. Bring thermos, red light, and tripod.

title: MONO + Bedless Bones (post-rock/shoegaze x dark electronics)
vibe: Underground-leaning touring bill; audiophile crowd, moody lights
reason: Strong match for heavy/atmospheric tastes, in one of Tallinn’s current culture hubs.

title: Decapitated + Employed To Serve (+ Humanity)
vibe: Modern death metal + UK hardcore; pits expected
reason: Legit heavy night with international + local support in DIY-friendly venue complex.

title: Beats from the Vault – Dark Souls Meeting (darkwave/EBM night)
vibe: Goth/dark synth heads; black attire welcome
reason: Recurring Tallinn darkwave social with live + DJs; aligns with underground electronics interest.

title: Foreign Founders Meetup (Tehnopol)
vibe: Tactical founder networking; practical customer-finding playbooks
reason: Directly relevant to early-stage founders; hosted by a core Estonian tech hub.

title: Lore Bistroo dinner + Põhjala Tap Room tour
location: Lore Bistroo (Peetri 12, Noblessner) + Põhjala Tap Room (Peetri 5)
timeframe: Any night; book Lore 18:30 then 20:30 beers, during Dec 1–14
vibe: Modern Estonian sharing plates, harborside; craft beer culture
reason: Mid-range with attitude and local cred (MICHELIN Bib). Walkable pairing in Noblessner.

title: Vietnam Night – All You Can Eat (Paavli canteen pop-up)
vibe: Community food night within the venue complex
reason: Good pre-game for shows on the Paavli campus; local crowd, casual vibe.
